original_text: For when Joshua and all Israel saw that the ambush had taken the city and that smoke was going up from it, they turned around and attacked the men of Ai.
korean_text: 여호수아와 온 이스라엘이 그 복병이 성읍을 점령함과 성읍에 연기가 오름을 보고 다시 돌이켜 아이 사람들을 쳐죽이고

sentences.original_text: For when Joshua and all Israel saw
that the ambush had taken the city
and that smoke was going up from it
and attacked the men of Ai
